name: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai
name_original: Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai
description:
Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It came out on 27-09-2011. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Total War: Shogun 2 - Rise of the Samurai on PC.
